nodes.name: Webhook Ingest
nodes.notes: ⚠️ rawBody: true is critical for HMAC validation

nodes.name: Has Validation Error?
nodes.notes: Check if extract-headers found validation errors

nodes.name: Compute HMAC (Code)
nodes.notes: v1.6.2: Syntax fixed, uses hmacValid flag. Secret from $env.HMAC_SECRET

nodes.name: HMAC Valid?
nodes.notes: v1.6.2: Now checks $json.hmacValid flag directly (clearer logic)

nodes.name: Timestamp Error?
nodes.notes: Check if timestamp validation failed

nodes.name: Check Nonce Exists
nodes.notes: ⚠️ Requires n8n-nodes-webdav community node

nodes.name: Metadata Error?
nodes.notes: Check if metadata validation failed

nodes.name: Check Transcript Exists
nodes.notes: Idempotency: Skip STT if transcript already exists. Gets path from Extract & Validate Metadata.

nodes.name: Prepare STT Request
nodes.notes: Prepares STT request. Preserves binary data for call-deepgram. Now includes filePath for WebDAV download.

nodes.name: Call Deepgram STT
nodes.notes: STT call with continueOnFail: true. Sends audio as binary with Content-Type: audio/mp4

nodes.name: STT HTTP Error?
nodes.notes: Checks if Deepgram returned HTTP 5xx error (continueOnFail mode)

nodes.name: Parse STT Response
nodes.notes: Parses STT response. Handles HTTP errors from continueOnFail mode.

nodes.name: STT Error?
nodes.notes: Check if STT processing failed

nodes.name: Prepare WF2 Data
nodes.notes: Prepares data for WF2 from both STT and idempotency paths

nodes.name: Trigger WF2
nodes.notes: Triggers WF2 with data from current item (works for both STT and idempotency paths)

nodes.name: Build Success Response
nodes.notes: Builds success response from current item (works for both paths)

nodes.name: Build Error Response
nodes.notes: v1.6.2: Error metadata includes workflow version

parameters.subject: WF1 v1.4 Error: {{$json.dlqEntry.meetingSlug}}

nodes.name: Load Existing Transcript
nodes.notes: Idempotency: Loads existing transcript, produces same structure as parse-stt-response

nodes.name: Set HMAC Error
nodes.notes: v1.7.0: Sets clear HMAC_INVALID error before DLQ

nodes.name: Normalize Nonce Check
nodes.notes: v1.7.0: Catches Nextcloud errors and normalizes exists field

nodes.name: Nonce Check Failed?
nodes.notes: v1.7.0: Routes Nextcloud errors to DLQ with 503

nodes.name: Set Replay Error
nodes.notes: v1.7.0: Sets clear REPLAY_DETECTED error before DLQ
